title: If the area of reservation is not adequate to construct independent building as mentioned above OR When it is not possible to handover individual plot along with public amenity, then in such cases Authority may allow composite building on said land subject to condition that the built up area mentioned as above may be allowed to be handed over to the Planning Authority or Appropriate Authority, as the case may be, preferably on ground floor and subject to payment of premium (1) for the land required to be handed over to Authority at the rate of 40% of land rate in ASR, without considering the guidelines therein
clause_text: If the area of reservation is not adequate to construct independent building as mentioned above OR When it is not possible to handover individual plot along with public amenity, then in such cases Authority may allow composite building on said land subject to condition that the built up area mentioned as above may be allowed to be handed over to the Planning Authority or Appropriate Authority, as the case may be, preferably on ground floor and subject to payment of premium (1) for the land required to be handed over to Authority at the rate of 40% of land rate in ASR, without considering the guidelines therein.If ground floor is utilised for parking, then such built up area shall be given on stilt / first floor with separate entry & exit from Public Street. In such cases, built-up area (along with proportionate undivided share in land) shall be handed over to the Planning Authority or Appropriate Authority, as the case may be.
